>It would be really funny if the shinobi were really just plain old 
>samurai, just with specialized training, simmilar to our special 
>forces. I think it would also be funny if they used roughly the same  
>exact weapons as the samurai, give or take 1 or 2. I would also laugh 
>too if they didn't wear black but dressed like the enemy to blend in,  
>and not be found out by a guard saying "Who is that in the black 
>pajamas with a sword, coming towards us?"
>
>Guard 2: "I don't know, we could just kill him then ask." 
>
>That would be an awesome joke.
>
>Maikeru

lol actually I think would be more like...

Guard 1: "Who is that in the black pajamas with a sword, coming towards us?"
Guard 2: "what is a pajamas?" 

I don't think at those times they even knew what is a pajama (not making a
pun on spelling I don't know how's spelled myself) personally I don't
really belive ninjas even existed at all. but still it's silly consider
silly the way they are depicted to dress... to us with our culture sounds
silly.. at the time and wif a different culture might look scary who knows
:D in japanese and chinese mythology there are alot of funny looking
creatures, yet japanese never considered them funny at all...
